jobDescription: Chief Data Scientist potential opening for P&C; insurance company in Southern California. Build predictive modeling team involving multiple commercial and personal lines of business. Serve as primary contact with CEO and Actuaries on all predictive modeling initiatives. Ideal candidate has superior communication, interpersonal, business, and management skills, as well as 10+ years of predictive modeling experience involving P&C; lines of business. Salary $open.(PR10446)
